meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Liz Good Drew Denton Katie Proctor Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6224.

td.p: Liz Good, a freelance editor from Brockton, Massachusetts
Drew Denton, a graduate student of American religious history from Decatur, Georgia
Katie Proctor, a stay-at-home mom from Hendersonville, North Carolina (whose 1-day cash winnings total $26,401)

tr.td: LITERARY NARRATORS
IT'S IN YOUR MIND
VIDEO GAME HISTORY
YOU SEE 'EM AT THE MUSEUM
ONE GOOD TURN
DESERVES AN "ITHER"

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Drew: Who is Tom Sawyer?)

Huck Finn

KatieDrew
')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'This Mark Twain character says that "Aunt Sally she\'s going to adopt me and sivilize me, and I can\'t stand it"')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: This Mark Twain character says that "Aunt Sally she's going to adopt me and sivilize me, and I can't stand it"

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
